maqras.text: They have dobry zvest z GOD's blessings a grace a lenze GOD never zlyhat reward believers
those respond GOD posol persecution they suffer maintain ich dobry robota lead righteous zivot velka reward
When ludia say do them Ludia mobilized ona; ona fear them this len zosilnit ich faith they say GOD suffices us; He je lepsie Protector
They zasluzit GOD's blessings grace ziaden harm vzdy touches them they attained GOD's approval GOD possesses infinite grace
bol devil's system instill fear jeho subjects Nie fear them fear Mna radsej if ona bol believers
Nie saddened those hasten disbelieve! They never zranit GOD v the maly Radsej GOD has willed ze they have share Hereafter They incurred hrozny retribution
Those zvolit si disbelief belief nie zranit GOD v the maly they incurred painful retribution
Let nie disbelievers myslienka my lead them for ich own dobre My len lead them on confirm ich sinfulness! They incurred humiliating retribution

GOD NIE bol LAVY believers ONA JE without distinguishing ZLY Z dobre Nor robit GOD informovat ona z buduci GOD bestows such znalost whomever He zvolit si Jeho posol! Therefore ona verit v GOD Jeho posol. Ona verit lead righteous zivot ona receive velka recompense

Let nie those withhold hoard GOD's provisions myslienka this bol dobry them; it bol zly for them! For they beriem ich hoarding ich krk Dni Vzkriesenie. GOD bol ultimate inheritor Z heavens ZEM. GOD JE fully Cognizant Z everything ONA ROBIT
GOD heard utterances those said GOD bol CHUDOBNY CHVILA MY bol ZIRNY. MY ZAPISNICA everything they said iba mat rad MY ZAPISNICA ICH killing prophets unjustly MY say Suffer retribution Hell
This bol consequence tvoj own zavodny. GOD bol never unjust towards ludia

bol they said GOD robit covenant us ze my nie verit v any posol he produces offering gets consumed zapalit. Say Posol mna pojdem do ona zretelny proofs inkluzive co ona iba ziadat! Why potom ona kill them ona robit bol truthful
they zamietnut ona posol ona zamietnut vecer they brought proofs Zalm enlightening scripture
Kazdy clovek chut smrt potom ona receive tvoj recompense Dni Vzkriesenie! Whoever zameskat Hell ledva robit it Raj attained velka triumph Zivot this world bol ziaden inak than iluzia
